ValidationRule.description: Case #30556311 - If Main Issue is Additional Notice or Duplicate Notice, must fill in Additional/Duplicate To field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" , OR (ISPICKVAL(Main_Issue__c , "Additional Notice"), ISPICKVAL(Main_Issue__c , "Duplicate Notice")), ISBLANK(Additional_Duplicate_To__c), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Admin")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The “Additional/Duplicate To” field cannot be blank if “Main Issue” equals ‘Additional Notice’ or ‘ Duplicate Notice’
